snippet.title: The Fading of Nicole Wilson | Nacon Connect 2025 Trailer
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2947700/The_Fading_of_Nicole_Wilson/
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10012630

"The Fading of Nicole Wilson" is a story-driven, folk-horror adventure game dealing with topics like authenticity, personal sacrifice and the cost of fitting in while daring players to unravel a dark, thrilling mystery.

https://www.oneoonegames.com/
